definition: to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: It is believed that the sperm whale dives deeper than any other cetacean.
sentences.chinese: 人们相信，抹香鲸比其他鲸类动物潜得更深。

sentences.english: There are about a dozen remora (suckerfish) attached to this whale.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还有十多条䲟鱼紧紧粘在这头抹香鲸身上。

sentences.english: Andrew and his friend, a young sperm whale named Scar, were swimming together off the west coast of Dominica.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁和他那被称作“刀疤”的抹香鲸朋友。

sentences.english: The sperm whale is believe to dive deeper than any other cetacean .
sentences.chinese: 人们相信，抹香鲸比其他鲸类动物潜得更深。

sentences.english: These animals are not unheard of in the Mediterranean basin.
sentences.chinese: 在地中海盆地中，抹香鲸并非没有被“听见”过。

sentences.english: Ambergris is the concretion in the intestine of the sperm-whale.
sentences.chinese: 龙涎香是抹香鲸肠内的结石。

sentences.english: The sperm whale is believed to dive deeper than any other cetacean.
sentences.chinese: 人们相信，抹香鲸比其他鲸类动物潜得更深。

sentences.english: Same result as Sperm Whale vs Orca.
sentences.chinese: 和抹香鲸和逆戟鲸的结果一样。
